<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Checks if service is up and running</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v2/health"}></MethodEndpoint>



If the service is running, this endpoint returns 200, otherwise the endpoint will be unreachable.

## Request

<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

The service is alive.

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"500"} value={"500"}><div>

Something failed internally. Nothing can be done about it.

</div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
